entry.title: FOG ADVISORY , Kincardine
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 5:42 PM EST Saturday 31 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: 2.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Goderich 5:00 PM EST Saturday 31 December 2022

Pressure / Tendency: 101.0 kPa rising
Humidity: 98 %

Wind: NW 9 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of rain. Low zero.
entry.summary: Periods of rain ending early this evening then cloudy. Fog patches dissipating late this evening. Low zero. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Saturday 31 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near plus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries or drizzle in the morning and early in the afternoon. Risk of freezing drizzle in the morning. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light near noon. Temperature steady near plus 2. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Saturday 31 December 2022
